home.title: Eldis Ymeraj
home.desc: Master’s student in Artificial Intelligence and Human Factors at the University of Caen Normandy. I am curious and motivated, always looking for new challenges to learn, grow and improve my skills.

projects.title: Handball Tracking
projects.desc: Detection & tracking of players, ball and field using YOLO & ByteTrack.

projects.title: AI for Games
projects.desc: Adversarial AI for Domino and Tic-Tac-Toe using MinMax & Expectimax.

projects.title: GraphQL & Docker Visualization
projects.desc: Interactive web app for data visualization with MongoDB & D3.js.

projects.title: ETL & OLAP
projects.desc: Data warehouse & OLAP cube built with Apache Hop.

projects.title: Multi-Agent System (JADE)
projects.desc: Implementation of a multi-agent system using the JADE library to simulate a production workshop.

projects.title: NLP – Text Transformation with WordNet & FastText
projects.desc: Automatic text rewriting using semantic relations (translation, hyponyms, antonyms) with WordNet and FastText.

about.title: About Me
about.text:
My name is Eldis Ymeraj and I am a Master's student in Artificial Intelligence and Human Factors at the University of Caen Normandy. My studies allow me to develop strong skills in artificial intelligence and data science, while also keeping an openness to human sciences such as psychology and neuroscience.

I am open to different internship opportunities, especially in the fields of data, machine learning or applied artificial intelligence, whether in research, industry or technological innovation.

Outside of my studies, I am passionate about sports and I regularly go to the gym. I also enjoy reading, especially scientific, historical and political books, which broaden my vision of the world. Finally, I love traveling and discovering new cultures, which keeps me curious and open-minded.

I consider myself a motivated, curious and ambitious person, always ready to learn and take on new challenges.
